#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define REP(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define rep(i,n) REP(i,0,n)

#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned ll
#define N 500
char A[N],B[N],C[N];
int dp[N][N][N];
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%s",A);
        scanf("%s",B);
        scanf("%s",C);
        int n = strlen(A);
        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)
        for(int k=1;k<=n;k++)
        {
            if(A[i-1]==B[j-1] && A[i-1]==C[k-1])
            dp[i][j][k] = dp[i-1][j-1][k-1]+1;
            else
            {
                dp[i][j][k] = max(dp[i-1][j][k],dp[i][j-1][k]);
                dp[i][j][k] = max(dp[i][j][k],dp[i][j][k-1]);
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n",(3*n)-(3*dp[n][n][n]));
    }

    return 0;
}
